vernac_cmds: Theorem round_val_of_pred : forall rnd : R -> R -> Prop, round_pred rnd -> forall x, { f : R | rnd x f }.
now apply H2 with (3 := Rle_refl x).
now apply H2 with (3 := Rle_refl x).
Theorem round_fun_of_pred : forall rnd : R -> R -> Prop, round_pred rnd -> { f : R -> R | forall x, rnd x (f x) }.
exists (fun x => proj1_sig (round_val_of_pred rnd H x)).
Theorem round_unicity : forall rnd : R -> R -> Prop, round_pred_monotone rnd -> forall x f1 f2, rnd x f1 -> rnd x f2 -> f1 = f2.
intros rnd Hr x f1 f2 H1 H2.
now apply Hr with (3 := Rle_refl x).
now apply Hr with (3 := Rle_refl x).
Theorem Rnd_DN_pt_monotone : forall F : R -> Prop, round_pred_monotone (Rnd_DN_pt F).
intros F x y f g (Hx1,(Hx2,_)) (Hy1,(_,Hy2)) Hxy.
Theorem Rnd_DN_pt_unicity : forall F : R -> Prop, forall x f1 f2 : R, Rnd_DN_pt F x f1 -> Rnd_DN_pt F x f2 -> f1 = f2.
Theorem Rnd_DN_unicity : forall F : R -> Prop, forall rnd1 rnd2 : R -> R, Rnd_DN F rnd1 -> Rnd_DN F rnd2 -> forall x, rnd1 x = rnd2 x.
intros F rnd1 rnd2 H1 H2 x.
Theorem Rnd_UP_pt_monotone : forall F : R -> Prop, round_pred_monotone (Rnd_UP_pt F).
intros F x y f g (Hx1,(_,Hx2)) (Hy1,(Hy2,_)) Hxy.
Theorem Rnd_UP_pt_unicity : forall F : R -> Prop, forall x f1 f2 : R, Rnd_UP_pt F x f1 -> Rnd_UP_pt F x f2 -> f1 = f2.
Theorem Rnd_UP_unicity : forall F : R -> Prop, forall rnd1 rnd2 : R -> R, Rnd_UP F rnd1 -> Rnd_UP F rnd2 -> forall x, rnd1 x = rnd2 x.
intros F rnd1 rnd2 H1 H2 x.
Theorem Rnd_DN_UP_pt_sym : forall F : R -> Prop, ( forall x, F x -> F (- x) ) -> forall x f : R, Rnd_DN_pt F x f -> Rnd_UP_pt F (-x) (-f).
intros F HF x f H.
Theorem Rnd_UP_DN_pt_sym : forall F : R -> Prop, ( forall x, F x -> F (- x) ) -> forall x f : R, Rnd_UP_pt F x f -> Rnd_DN_pt F (-x) (-f).
intros F HF x f H.
Theorem Rnd_DN_UP_sym : forall F : R -> Prop, ( forall x, F x -> F (- x) ) -> forall rnd1 rnd2 : R -> R, Rnd_DN F rnd1 -> Rnd_UP F rnd2 -> forall x, rnd1 (- x) = - rnd2 x.
intros F HF rnd1 rnd2 H1 H2 x.
Theorem Rnd_DN_UP_pt_split : forall F : R -> Prop, forall x d u, Rnd_DN_pt F x d -> Rnd_UP_pt F x u -> forall f, F f -> (f <= d) \/ (u <= f).
intros F x d u Hd Hu f Hf.
Theorem Rnd_DN_pt_refl : forall F : R -> Prop, forall x : R, F x -> Rnd_DN_pt F x x.
Theorem Rnd_DN_pt_idempotent : forall F : R -> Prop, forall x f : R, Rnd_DN_pt F x f -> F x -> f = x.
Theorem Rnd_UP_pt_refl : forall F : R -> Prop, forall x : R, F x -> Rnd_UP_pt F x x.
Theorem Rnd_UP_pt_idempotent : forall F : R -> Prop, forall x f : R, Rnd_UP_pt F x f -> F x -> f = x.
Theorem Only_DN_or_UP : forall F : R -> Prop, forall x fd fu f : R, Rnd_DN_pt F x fd -> Rnd_UP_pt F x fu -> F f -> (fd <= f <= fu)%R -> f = fd \/ f = fu.
intros F x fd fu f Hd Hu Hf [Hdf Hfu].
Theorem Rnd_ZR_abs : forall (F : R -> Prop) (rnd: R-> R), Rnd_ZR F rnd -> forall x : R, (Rabs (rnd x) <= Rabs x)%R.
Theorem Rnd_ZR_pt_monotone : forall F : R -> Prop, F 0 -> round_pred_monotone (Rnd_ZR_pt F).
intros F F0 x y f g (Hx1, Hx2) (Hy1, Hy2) Hxy.
Theorem Rnd_N_pt_DN_or_UP : forall F : R -> Prop, forall x f : R, Rnd_N_pt F x f -> Rnd_DN_pt F x f \/ Rnd_UP_pt F x f.
Theorem Rnd_N_pt_DN_or_UP_eq : forall F : R -> Prop, forall x fd fu f : R, Rnd_DN_pt F x fd -> Rnd_UP_pt F x fu -> Rnd_N_pt F x f -> f = fd \/ f = fu.
intros F x fd fu f Hd Hu Hf.
destruct (Rnd_N_pt_DN_or_UP F x f Hf) as [H|H].
Theorem Rnd_N_pt_sym : forall F : R -> Prop, ( forall x, F x -> F (- x) ) -> forall x f : R, Rnd_N_pt F (-x) (-f) -> Rnd_N_pt F x f.
Theorem Rnd_N_pt_monotone : forall F : R -> Prop, forall x y f g : R, Rnd_N_pt F x f -> Rnd_N_pt F y g -> x < y -> f <= g.
intros F x y f g (Hf,Hx) (Hg,Hy) Hxy.
clear F Hf Hg Hx Hy.
rewrite Rabs_left, Rabs_pos_eq, Ropp_minus_distr in Hgfy.
rewrite Rabs_pos_eq, Rabs_left, Ropp_minus_distr in Hfgx.
apply Rle_not_lt with (1 := Rplus_le_compat _ _ _ _ Hfgx Hgfy).
Theorem Rnd_N_pt_unicity : forall F : R -> Prop, forall x d u f1 f2 : R, Rnd_DN_pt F x d -> Rnd_UP_pt F x u -> x - d <> u - x -> Rnd_N_pt F x f1 -> Rnd_N_pt F x f2 -> f1 = f2.
intros F x d u f1 f2 Hd Hu Hdu.
assert (forall f1 f2, Rnd_N_pt F x f1 -> Rnd_N_pt F x f2 -> f1 < f2 -> False).
intros f1 f2 Hf1 Hf2 H12.
destruct (Rnd_N_pt_DN_or_UP F x f1 Hf1) as [Hd1|Hu1] ; destruct (Rnd_N_pt_DN_or_UP F x f2 Hf2) as [Hd2|Hu2].
now apply Rle_antisym ; apply Rnot_lt_le ; refine (H _ _ _ _).
Theorem Rnd_N_pt_refl : forall F : R -> Prop, forall x : R, F x -> Rnd_N_pt F x x.
Theorem Rnd_N_pt_idempotent : forall F : R -> Prop, forall x f : R, Rnd_N_pt F x f -> F x -> f = x.
Theorem Rnd_N_pt_0 : forall F : R -> Prop, F 0 -> Rnd_N_pt F 0 0.
Theorem Rnd_N_pt_pos : forall F : R -> Prop, F 0 -> forall x f, 0 <= x -> Rnd_N_pt F x f -> 0 <= f.
intros F HF x f [Hx|Hx] Hxf.
Theorem Rnd_N_pt_neg : forall F : R -> Prop, F 0 -> forall x f, x <= 0 -> Rnd_N_pt F x f -> f <= 0.
intros F HF x f [Hx|Hx] Hxf.
Theorem Rnd_N_pt_abs : forall F : R -> Prop, F 0 -> ( forall x, F x -> F (- x) ) -> forall x f : R, Rnd_N_pt F x f -> Rnd_N_pt F (Rabs x) (Rabs f).
intros F HF0 HF x f Hxf.
Theorem Rnd_DN_UP_pt_N : forall F : R -> Prop, forall x d u f : R, F f -> Rnd_DN_pt F x d -> Rnd_UP_pt F x u -> (Rabs (f - x) <= x - d)%R -> (Rabs (f - x) <= u - x)%R -> Rnd_N_pt F x f.
intros F x d u f Hf Hxd Hxu Hd Hu.
destruct (Rnd_DN_UP_pt_split F x d u Hxd Hxu g Hg) as [Hgd|Hgu].
Theorem Rnd_DN_pt_N : forall F : R -> Prop, forall x d u : R, Rnd_DN_pt F x d -> Rnd_UP_pt F x u -> (x - d <= u - x)%R -> Rnd_N_pt F x d.
intros F x d u Hd Hu Hx.
Theorem Rnd_UP_pt_N : forall F : R -> Prop, forall x d u : R, Rnd_DN_pt F x d -> Rnd_UP_pt F x u -> (u - x <= x - d)%R -> Rnd_N_pt F x u.
intros F x d u Hd Hu Hx.
Definition Rnd_NG_pt_unicity_prop F P := forall x d u, Rnd_DN_pt F x d -> Rnd_N_pt F x d -> Rnd_UP_pt F x u -> Rnd_N_pt F x u -> P x d -> P x u -> d = u.
Theorem Rnd_NG_pt_unicity : forall (F : R -> Prop) (P : R -> R -> Prop), Rnd_NG_pt_unicity_prop F P -> forall x f1 f2 : R, Rnd_NG_pt F P x f1 -> Rnd_NG_pt F P x f2 -> f1 = f2.
intros F P HP x f1 f2 (H1a,H1b) (H2a,H2b).
destruct (Rnd_N_pt_DN_or_UP _ _ _ H1a) as [H1c|H1c] ; destruct (Rnd_N_pt_DN_or_UP _ _ _ H2a) as [H2c|H2c].
now apply (HP x f2 f1 H2c H2a H1c H1a).
Theorem Rnd_NG_pt_monotone : forall (F : R -> Prop) (P : R -> R -> Prop), Rnd_NG_pt_unicity_prop F P -> round_pred_monotone (Rnd_NG_pt F P).
intros F P HP x y f g (Hf,Hx) (Hg,Hy) [Hxy|Hxy].
now apply Rnd_N_pt_monotone with F x y.
Theorem Rnd_NG_pt_refl : forall (F : R -> Prop) (P : R -> R -> Prop), forall x, F x -> Rnd_NG_pt F P x x.

Theorem Rnd_NG_pt_sym : forall (F : R -> Prop) (P : R -> R -> Prop), ( forall x, F x -> F (-x) ) -> ( forall x f, P x f -> P (-x) (-f) ) -> forall x f : R, Rnd_NG_pt F P (-x) (-f) -> Rnd_NG_pt F P x f.
intros F P HF HP x f (H1,H2).
Theorem Rnd_NG_unicity : forall (F : R -> Prop) (P : R -> R -> Prop), Rnd_NG_pt_unicity_prop F P -> forall rnd1 rnd2 : R -> R, Rnd_NG F P rnd1 -> Rnd_NG F P rnd2 -> forall x, rnd1 x = rnd2 x.
intros F P HP rnd1 rnd2 H1 H2 x.
now apply Rnd_NG_pt_unicity with F P x.
Theorem Rnd_NA_NG_pt : forall F : R -> Prop, F 0 -> forall x f, Rnd_NA_pt F x f <-> Rnd_NG_pt F (fun x f => Rabs x <= Rabs f) x f.
assert (Hf := Rnd_N_pt_pos F HF x f Hx H1).
rewrite Rabs_pos_eq with (1 := Hf) in H2.
now apply Rnd_N_pt_pos with F x.
assert (Hf := Rnd_N_pt_pos F HF x f Hx H1).
assert (Hf2 := Rnd_N_pt_pos F HF x f2 Hx Hxf2).
assert (Hf := Rnd_N_pt_neg F HF x f Hx H1).
rewrite Rabs_left1 with (1 := Hf) in H2.
now apply Rnd_N_pt_neg with F x.
assert (Hf := Rnd_N_pt_neg F HF x f Hx H1).
assert (Hf2 := Rnd_N_pt_neg F HF x f2 Hx Hxf2).
Theorem Rnd_NA_pt_unicity_prop : forall F : R -> Prop, F 0 -> Rnd_NG_pt_unicity_prop F (fun a b => (Rabs a <= Rabs b)%R).
intros F HF x d u Hxd1 Hxd2 Hxu1 Hxu2 Hd Hu.
rewrite Rabs_pos_eq with (1 := Hx) in Hd.
rewrite Rabs_left with (1 := Hx) in Hu.
Theorem Rnd_NA_pt_unicity : forall F : R -> Prop, F 0 -> forall x f1 f2 : R, Rnd_NA_pt F x f1 -> Rnd_NA_pt F x f2 -> f1 = f2.
intros F HF x f1 f2 H1 H2.
Theorem Rnd_NA_N_pt : forall F : R -> Prop, F 0 -> forall x f : R, Rnd_N_pt F x f -> (Rabs x <= Rabs f)%R -> Rnd_NA_pt F x f.
intros F HF x f Rxf Hxf.
replace (2 * x - f)%R with (x - (f - x))%R by ring.
rewrite 2!Rabs_pos_eq ; try ( apply (Rnd_N_pt_pos F HF x) ; assumption ).
rewrite 2!Rabs_left1 ; try ( apply (Rnd_N_pt_neg F HF x) ; assumption ).
Theorem Rnd_NA_unicity : forall (F : R -> Prop), F 0 -> forall rnd1 rnd2 : R -> R, Rnd_NA F rnd1 -> Rnd_NA F rnd2 -> forall x, rnd1 x = rnd2 x.
intros F HF rnd1 rnd2 H1 H2 x.
now apply Rnd_NA_pt_unicity with F x.
Theorem Rnd_NA_pt_monotone : forall F : R -> Prop, F 0 -> round_pred_monotone (Rnd_NA_pt F).
intros F HF x y f g Hxf Hyg Hxy.
apply (Rnd_NG_pt_monotone F _ (Rnd_NA_pt_unicity_prop F HF) x y).
Theorem Rnd_NA_pt_refl : forall F : R -> Prop, forall x : R, F x -> Rnd_NA_pt F x x.
Theorem Rnd_NA_pt_idempotent : forall F : R -> Prop, forall x f : R, Rnd_NA_pt F x f -> F x -> f = x.
Theorem round_pred_ge_0 : forall P : R -> R -> Prop, round_pred_monotone P -> P 0 0 -> forall x f, P x f -> 0 <= x -> 0 <= f.
intros P HP HP0 x f Hxf Hx.
Theorem round_pred_gt_0 : forall P : R -> R -> Prop, round_pred_monotone P -> P 0 0 -> forall x f, P x f -> 0 < f -> 0 < x.
intros P HP HP0 x f Hxf Hf.
Theorem round_pred_le_0 : forall P : R -> R -> Prop, round_pred_monotone P -> P 0 0 -> forall x f, P x f -> x <= 0 -> f <= 0.
intros P HP HP0 x f Hxf Hx.
Theorem round_pred_lt_0 : forall P : R -> R -> Prop, round_pred_monotone P -> P 0 0 -> forall x f, P x f -> f < 0 -> x < 0.
intros P HP HP0 x f Hxf Hf.
Theorem Rnd_DN_pt_equiv_format : forall F1 F2 : R -> Prop, forall a b : R, F1 a -> ( forall x, a <= x <= b -> (F1 x <-> F2 x) ) -> forall x f, a <= x <= b -> Rnd_DN_pt F1 x f -> Rnd_DN_pt F2 x f.
intros F1 F2 a b Ha HF x f Hx (H1, (H2, H3)).
Theorem Rnd_UP_pt_equiv_format : forall F1 F2 : R -> Prop, forall a b : R, F1 b -> ( forall x, a <= x <= b -> (F1 x <-> F2 x) ) -> forall x f, a <= x <= b -> Rnd_UP_pt F1 x f -> Rnd_UP_pt F2 x f.
intros F1 F2 a b Hb HF x f Hx (H1, (H2, H3)).
Inductive satisfies_any (F : R -> Prop) := Satisfies_any : F 0 -> ( forall x : R, F x -> F (-x) ) -> round_pred_total (Rnd_DN_pt F) -> satisfies_any F.
Theorem satisfies_any_eq : forall F1 F2 : R -> Prop, ( forall x, F1 x <-> F2 x ) -> satisfies_any F1 -> satisfies_any F2.
intros F1 F2 Heq (Hzero, Hsym, Hrnd).
Theorem satisfies_any_imp_DN : forall F : R -> Prop, satisfies_any F -> round_pred (Rnd_DN_pt F).
Theorem satisfies_any_imp_UP : forall F : R -> Prop, satisfies_any F -> round_pred (Rnd_UP_pt F).
Theorem satisfies_any_imp_ZR : forall F : R -> Prop, satisfies_any F -> round_pred (Rnd_ZR_pt F).
destruct (proj1 (satisfies_any_imp_DN F Hany) x) as (f, Hf).
destruct (proj1 (satisfies_any_imp_UP F Hany) x) as (f, Hf).
Definition NG_existence_prop (F : R -> Prop) (P : R -> R -> Prop) := forall x d u, ~F x -> Rnd_DN_pt F x d -> Rnd_UP_pt F x u -> P x u \/ P x d.
Theorem satisfies_any_imp_NG : forall (F : R -> Prop) (P : R -> R -> Prop), satisfies_any F -> NG_existence_prop F P -> round_pred_total (Rnd_NG_pt F P).
intros F P Hany HP x.
destruct (proj1 (satisfies_any_imp_DN F Hany) x) as (d, Hd).
destruct (proj1 (satisfies_any_imp_UP F Hany) x) as (u, Hu).
destruct (Rnd_N_pt_DN_or_UP_eq F x _ _ _ Hd Hu Hf) as [K|K] ; rewrite K.
destruct (HP x _ _ Hf Hd Hu) as [H'|H'].
destruct (Rnd_N_pt_DN_or_UP_eq F x _ _ _ Hd Hu Hf) as [K|K] ; rewrite K.
Theorem satisfies_any_imp_NA : forall F : R -> Prop, satisfies_any F -> round_pred (Rnd_NA_pt F).
assert (H : round_pred_total (Rnd_NG_pt F (fun a b => (Rabs a <= Rabs b)%R))).
intros x d u Hf Hd Hu.

intros F HF x f [Hx|Hx] Hxf.
intros F HF0 HF x f Hxf.
intros F x d u f Hf Hxd Hxu Hd Hu.

intros F x d u Hd Hu Hx.
intros F P HP x f1 f2 (H1a,H1b) (H2a,H2b).

now apply (HP x f2 f1 H2c H2a H1c H1a).
intros F P HP x y f g (Hf,Hx) (Hg,Hy) [Hxy|Hxy].
now apply Rnd_N_pt_monotone with F x y.
intros F P HF HP x f (H1,H2).
intros F P HP rnd1 rnd2 H1 H2 x.
now apply Rnd_NG_pt_unicity with F P x.
assert (Hf := Rnd_N_pt_pos F HF x f Hx H1).
rewrite Rabs_pos_eq with (1 := Hf) in H2.
now apply Rnd_N_pt_pos with F x.
assert (Hf := Rnd_N_pt_pos F HF x f Hx H1).
assert (Hf2 := Rnd_N_pt_pos F HF x f2 Hx Hxf2).
assert (Hf := Rnd_N_pt_neg F HF x f Hx H1).

now apply Rnd_N_pt_neg with F x.
assert (Hf := Rnd_N_pt_neg F HF x f Hx H1).
assert (Hf2 := Rnd_N_pt_neg F HF x f2 Hx Hxf2).

rewrite Rabs_pos_eq with (1 := Hx) in Hd.

intros F HF x f Rxf Hxf.

rewrite 2!Rabs_left1 ; try ( apply (Rnd_N_pt_neg F HF x) ; assumption ).

now apply Rnd_NA_pt_unicity with F x.

apply (Rnd_NG_pt_monotone F _ (Rnd_NA_pt_unicity_prop F HF) x y).

intros F1 F2 a b Hb HF x f Hx (H1, (H2, H3)).

destruct (proj1 (satisfies_any_imp_UP F Hany) x) as (f, Hf).

destruct (proj1 (satisfies_any_imp_UP F Hany) x) as (u, Hu).

intros x d u Hf Hd Hu.
